title: John Mulaney Announces 2025 Standup Tour “Mister Whatever”
description: The 35-date outing kicks off in June and runs through December. John Mulaney Announces 2025 Standup Tour “Mister Whatever” Scoop Harrison
author: Scoop Harrison
excerpt: John Mulaney has announced the first leg of a new standup tour. Dubbed "John Mulaney: Mister Whatever," the 31-date outing commences on June 27th.
text: John Mulaney has announced the first leg of a new standup tour. Dubbed “John Mulaney: Mister Whatever,” the 35-date outing commences on June 27th in Newark, New Jersey, and runs through December. The itinerary includes stops in cities including Toronto, Philadelphia, San Diego, Detroit, Cleveland, Austin, San Francisco, Tampa, Orlando, Atlanta, and Washington, DC. Along the way, Mulaney will also play select dates alongside Jon Stewart and Pete Davidson; Martin Short; and Fred Armisen, Mike Birbiglia, and Nick Kroll. Get John Mulaney Tickets Here Tickets for some dates are already on sale, while others will be available starting Friday, April 25th at 10:00 a.m. local time via Ticketmaster. A pre-sale begins Wednesday, April 23rd at 10:00 a.m. local time (use code MISTER). Mulaney is currently hosting his weekly variety series, Everybody’s Live with John Mulaney, on Netflix, with new episodes debuting each Wednesday through May 14th. html:
John Mulaney has announced the first leg of a new standup tour. Dubbed “John Mulaney: Mister Whatever,” the 35-date outing commences on June 27th in Newark, New Jersey, and runs through December.

The itinerary includes stops in cities including Toronto, Philadelphia, San Diego, Detroit, Cleveland, Austin, San Francisco, Tampa, Orlando, Atlanta, and Washington, DC. Along the way, Mulaney will also play select dates alongside Jon Stewart and Pete Davidson; Martin Short; and Fred Armisen, Mike Birbiglia, and Nick Kroll.

Get John Mulaney Tickets Here

Tickets for some dates are already on sale, while others will be available starting Friday, April 25th at 10:00 a.m. local time via Ticketmaster. A pre-sale begins Wednesday, April 23rd at 10:00 a.m. local time (use code MISTER).

Mulaney is currently hosting his weekly variety series, Everybody’s Live with John Mulaney, on Netflix, with new episodes debuting each Wednesday through May 14th.

John Mulaney 2025 Tour Dates:
06/27 — Newark, NJ @ Prudential Center (with Jon Stewart and Pete Davidson)
